name: MinimalToast
summary: A minimalistic toast message with three states: Error, Warning and Success.
description: 'MinimalToast is a minimal toast message pods that has three states to play with: Error, Warning and Success. It is very easy to use, just write Toast.showToast(state: <State>, message: <String>). Now with animation: Just use Toast.animates boolean to activate/deactivate the animation.'
